knimeNode.name: Meta Info Inserter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Inserts key, values pairs as meta information to documents.

fullDescription.intro: Inserts key, values pairs as meta information to documents. The column headers are used as keys while the values are provided in the cells of the selected columns.
fullDescription.option: Check, if meta info columns should be removed after insertion.
Select columns containing meta information to be inserted.

ports.inPort: The input table which contains the documents and the meta information in additional columns.
ports.outPort: The output table which contains documents with the meta info inserted.
